chat_input_placeholder.pt: Fale com o assistente de bordado...

initial_message.en: Hello! I'm your embroidery assistant. I can help you choose Anchor thread colors based on an image you'd like to embroider, or assist you with other embroidery-related questions. Just send an image or describe your project, and I'll suggest the best color options. How can I help you today?
